headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Taxi
content: One minute you’re picking up a nice old lady from the florist, the next you’re taking some guys with face tattoos to a remote warehouse for a “business meeting”. With a Downtown Cab Co. Taxi, you’re going to see a lot of things on your shifts…and most of them, your lawyer’s going to advise you to forget. Available now from Warstock Cache and Carry.
